entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this morning then cloudy. Snow inland this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 4 cm inland. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
